nodes.bodyText: Why don't we use the upstream decorators?

Hello @iocanel
Because as for now, the generated resources for memory limits/requests is named "mem" and not "memory" in dekorate.
This was the goal of my PR: dekorateio/dekorate#653 you merged into dekorate some days ago.
Until this fix is incorporated into a dekorate release and the new version bumped into Quarkus, we have to use that custom decorator.
Once done, of course, I will correct to use the upstream decorator.

Hello @iocanel
Now that upstream fix have been integrated into Quarkus, I remove the custom decorator for "requests memory".
